text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: No moon now blushes on the enamoured sight;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr r09_line

LMNL.text: No genial sun now warms the torpid lay

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr r10_line

LMNL.text: Since February sternly checked his ray

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr r11_line

LMNL.text: When Lucy's eyes first beamed their azure light.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r14_phr r15_line

LMNL.text: What though no vernal flowers my hand invite

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r14_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r14_phr r16_line

LMNL.text: To crop their fragrance for your natal day;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r17_line r18_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r17_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r17_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: for you the snowdrop and the bay

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r19_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r12_quatrain r13_s r19_phr r20_line

LMNL.text: Shall blend the unfading green and modest white.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r24_phr r25_line

LMNL.text: Though on your natal day with aspect bleak

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r24_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r24_phr r26_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r26_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r26_line r27_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r28_line r29_phr

LMNL.text: Still may the rosy summer robe your cheek

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r23_quatrain r30_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: And the green spring still bud within your breast:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r32_couplet r33_line r34_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r32_couplet r33_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r32_couplet r33_line r35_phr

LMNL.text: the world fading on your closing eyes,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r32_couplet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r21_sestet r22_s r32_couplet r36_line r37_phr

LMNL.text: You find a golden autumn in the skies.
